Package com.scivicslab.pluggablecli

package com.scivicslab.pluggablecli
  • Class
    Description
    CliPlugin
    Service provider interface for plugin-based CLI command registration.
    CommandDefinition
    Immutable value object holding the complete definition of a CLI command.
    CommandRepository
    Central registry for CLI command definitions and their execution logic.
    HelpFormatter
    Custom help formatter that renders help output as an ordered list of sections.
    HelpFormatter.Section
    Immutable section descriptor rendered by this formatter.
    HelpFormatter.Section.Kind
    Section kinds supported by the formatter.
    HelpFormatterBuilder
    Builder capturing layout configuration for HelpFormatter.
    PluginLoader
    Discovers and manages CliPlugin instances via ServiceLoader.
